Package com.valmet.watermark.controller

Class AddWaterMarkToPdfController

java.lang.Object
com.valmet.watermark.controller.AddWaterMarkToPdfController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class AddWaterMarkToPdfController extends Object
AddWaterMarkToPdfController class for handling requests to add watermarks to PDF files.

This controller provides an API endpoint to upload PDF files and apply watermarks based on optional metadata such as person ID and system.

Version:
1.0
Author:
BJIT

  • Method Details

    • uploadFilesAndAddWatermark

      @PostMapping(value="/watermark", consumes="multipart/form-data") @CircuitBreaker(name="watermark-api", fallbackMethod="uploadFilesFallback") @Bulkhead(name="watermark-api", type=SEMAPHORE) public CompletableFuture<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>> uploadFilesAndAddWatermark(@RequestParam("file") List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> files, @RequestParam(value="personID",required=false) String personID, @RequestParam(value="system",required=false) String system, @RequestParam(value="email",required=false) String email) throws IOException
      Endpoint to upload PDF files and add watermarks.

      This method accepts multiple PDF files and optional metadata (person ID and system) to apply watermarks to the files.

      Parameters:
      files - a list of MultipartFile objects representing the PDF files to be watermarked
      personID - an optional string representing the person ID for watermark metadata
      system - an optional string representing the system for watermark metadata
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the watermarking operation
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file processing

    • uploadFilesFallback

      public CompletableFuture<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>> uploadFilesFallback(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> files, String personID, String system, String email, Throwable throwable)
